name: WWC - World War Corona
description:
World War Corona is a light weight shooter game .  I Built it in a short time while in quarantine to help combat the frustration regarding the whole corona virus situation.  It's Free Try it Out!

Its a fully playable game but in early access so to get insights on how to improve it and build upon it. I need your help to steer me in the correct direction. So basically I have 3 branches I can follow:

1- Turn it into a Multiplayer Game
2- A  Story Based Single Player Game
3- Make it a VR game

Give Your Opinion On Above
